name: SmileBox Widget
author: Igor Karpov

sections.description: Features: * Order – sets whether new ones come first or old ones ome first. * Author, Date – sets whether item author, date will be inserted or not. * Style – sets the enclosing HTML tag from either ol, ul, or div. * Type – sets the comment type from either Comments, Pingbacks and Trackbacks, Pingbacks, Trackbacks or All. * Color – set custom color for smile, text inside of block
sections.installation:
Before using this theme, you have to install WordPress. To install WordPress, just follow instructions in the WordPress Codex: Installing WordPress

To install SmileBox plugin, there are 2 ways:

First way: In the Dashboard, navigate to Plugins. Click Add New Â» Upload and then upload the file nxIK-smile-box-widget.zip. After uploading completed, just activate the plugin. Second way: Using FTP Upload. Filezilla is a free FTP Software. Extract the nxIK-smile-box-widget.zip file and upload the folder to directory /wp-content/plugins/ on your server.

short_description: The widget is designed to stimulate comments, trackbacks and pingbacks on your site, thereby raising the popularity of your site.
description: Features: * Order – sets whether new ones come first or old ones ome first. * Author, Date – sets whether item author, date will be inserted or not. * Style – sets the enclosing HTML tag from either ol, ul, or div. * Type – sets the comment type from either Comments, Pingbacks and Trackbacks, Pingbacks, Trackbacks or All. * Color – set custom color for smile, text inside of block
